metadata.title: CVE-2022-28289 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Mozilla developers and community members Nika Layzell, Andrew McCreight,Gabriele Svelto, and the Mozilla Fuzzing Team reported memory safety bugspresent in Thunderbird 91.7. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memorycorruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could havebeen exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affectsThunderbird < 91.8, Firefox < 99, and Firefox ESR < 91.8.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
